title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of arrivals in millions, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Number of arrivals in millions has increased over the Year
Number of arrivals in millions is gradually constant from 2006 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Number of arrivals in millions about 5.49 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Number of arrivals in millions about 3.34 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of arrivals in millions, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2009 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2018.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2006 to 2009.
